group_1.textRight: She's still not awake?@...I can't apologize enough.

group_1.textLeft: No worries! Her Soul Gem's nice and bright.@I'll just make sure she gets a good rest.

group_1.textRight: Iroha should be here any minute. She ought to be@able to help her recover.

group_1.narration: Somehow, we managed to avert a full-scale conflict.
It seems that Nanami and Izumi,@the lynchpins of the Union's West and East sides...
...have respectively been friends with@Azusa and Yakumo for quite some time.
Nanase found the latter two at@the Coordinator's shop and brought them over...
...at which point the former two returned to their senses,@almost as if they had been possessed.
Upon returning to the shop, we finally received@an explanation as to what had caused all this.

group_1.textRight: ...They were just acting in a film you're producing?

group_1.textLeft: Yes! Exactly.
I'm not exactly sure how...
But it apparently got warped into an account of@Ami bullying Chiaki.

group_1.textRight: ...Then it seems I've done something terribly@untoward.
When I first approached them about it, I really did@mean to simply confirm the details of what@happened...
But as I started talking, those thoughts suddenly vanished from my head.
...Something had to have been wrong with me.@That's all I can think of.

group_1.textLeft: And once Kanagi started browbeating you, I'm sure@you must've been too scared to say anything back...!

group_1.textRight: Well, actually...
I really felt like it was my fault for making her cry.@...I couldn't think of it any other way.

group_1.textLeft: As if you were completely immersed in the "female student" role?

group_1.textRight: Yes...! That's exactly it!

group_1.textLeft: What about Riko and Tsukasa? You too?

group_1.textRight: I know it was a misunderstanding, but that just...@didn't occur to me until a minute ago?

group_1.textLeft: ...I wasn't acting right, either.
After a few minutes of being there, I couldn't think@of anything but crushing Kanagi.

group_1.textRight: Even YOU, Yachiyo?
Likewise. I was so outraged that Tsukihiko's sister@had been humiliated...
[chara:101601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, who's Tsukihiko?

group_1.textLeft: A character in the movie we were making.
...His role was played by my friend over there.
But you'd never even heard of the movie, right?@How did you know about that?
On top of that, you were acting just like Tsukihiko's@friend.
...Almost like you were possessed.

group_1.textRight: Why...?

group_1.textLeft: Um, maybe this is because of...
My whole "trouble magnet" thing?

group_1.textRight: Oh, that's right. You're especially prone to running@into situations like this.

group_1.textLeft: ...Mm-hm. Because of my wish.

group_1.textRight: Well, even if that's the reason you stumbled@across us...
We still don't know the source of the trouble itself, right?

group_1.textLeft: ...I suppose so.

group_1.textRight: If nothing else, I'm fairly certain that this situation...
...is the result of some sort of magic at work.

group_1.textLeft: Welcooome... oh?@I thought you were Iroha.

group_1.textRight: Is it true that Tsukihiko collapsed?!

group_1.textLeft: Whâ€”@Mihono?!

group_1.textRight: TSUKIHIKO!

group_1.textLeft: ...Mm?@Ruri?
What happened to me?

group_1.textRight: Oh, thank goodness!@Tsukihiko...!
Psst. Are they...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. They're completely absorbed in their movie@characters' personas...

group_1.textRight: ...If I may ask.
Just what kind of movie were you three filming?
